trans-unit.source: Provides the event data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Zapewnia dane zdarzeń dla <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected"> </xref> i <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected"> </xref> zdarzenia <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> formantu.

trans-unit.source: Using the capabilities of the Web Parts control set, it is possible to create a connection between two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server controls, with one control acting as the provider, and the other acting as the consumer of data.
trans-unit.target: Za pomocą funkcji zestawu sterującego części sieci Web, możliwe jest tworzenie połączenia między dwiema <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>lub inne formanty serwera, z jedną kontrolkę działający jako dostawca i inne działania jako konsumentów danych.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: To form a connection, the two controls must reside in a zone that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control), and they must be designed correctly to share data through a common interface.
trans-unit.target: Do utworzenia połączenia, dwóch formantów musi znajdować się w strefie, która dziedziczy <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>klasy (takich jak <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>kontroli), i muszą być prawidłowo zaprojektowane i udostępniać dane za pomocą wspólnego interfejsu.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> and [Web Parts Connections Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać szczegółowe informacje dotyczące połączeń części sieci Web, zobacz <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>i [Omówienie połączeń części sieci Web](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartConnectionsEventArgs class passes event data to methods that use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventHandler> delegate to handle events.
trans-unit.target: Klasa WebPartConnectionsEventArgs przekazuje dane zdarzeń do metod, które używają <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventHandler>obiektu delegowanego obsługi zdarzeń.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: There are two such connection-related methods that raise events and use the WebPartConnectionsEventArgs class to provide event data.
trans-unit.target: Istnieją dwie takie związane z połączeniem metody wywoływanie zdarzeń, które obsługują klasy WebPartConnectionsEventArgs danych zdarzenia.

trans-unit.source: Both are members of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Oba są członkami <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontroli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> event after two server controls have successfully connected, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnected%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> event after two server controls have been disconnected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A>Metoda zgłasza <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>zdarzenia po dwóch formantów serwera pomyślnie nawiązano połączenie i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnected%2A>zgłasza — metoda <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected>zdarzenia po rozłączeniu dwóch formantów serwera.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnected%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A>

trans-unit.source: Developers can create custom event handler methods for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> events, and in those methods, they can use the WebPartConnectionsEventArgs class to access details of a connection.
trans-unit.target: Deweloperzy mogą tworzyć niestandardowe zdarzenie metody obsługi <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected>zdarzenia, a w tych metod, można użyć klasy WebPartConnectionsEventArgs dostępu szczegóły połączenia.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>

trans-unit.source: For example, a developer can declare the `OnWebPartsConnected` attribute on the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element, and assign to it a custom method name that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Na przykład deweloper może zadeklarować `OnWebPartsConnected` atrybutu `<asp:webpartmanager>` element i przypisz do niego nazwę niestandardowej metody, która obsłuży zdarzenie.

trans-unit.source: In the custom handler method, developers can access the details of a connection by using the WebPartConnectionsEventArgs object that is passed to the method as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: W metodzie niestandardowego programu obsługi deweloperzy mogą korzystać szczegóły połączenia za pomocą obiektu WebPartConnectionsEventArgs, który jest przekazywany do metody jako parametr.

trans-unit.source: The WebPartConnectionsEventArgs class has two overloads of the constructor.
trans-unit.target: Klasa WebPartConnectionsEventArgs ma dwa przeciążenia konstruktora.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor is the default; it initializes the property values for the class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%29?displayProperty=fullName>Wartość domyślna to Konstruktor; inicjuje jej wartości właściwości dla klasy.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor calls the default constructor, and then it also initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%29?displayProperty=fullName>Konstruktor wywołuje konstruktor domyślny, a następnie również inicjuje <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A>Właściwości.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartConnectionsEventArgs class has several properties, all of which refer to the essential aspects of a Web Parts connection.
trans-unit.target: Klasa WebPartConnectionsEventArgs ma kilka właściwości, które dotyczą istotne aspekty połączeń części sieci Web.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A> property refers to the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object that represents the entire connection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A>Właściwość odwołuje się do skojarzonego <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>obiekt, który reprezentuje całego połączenia.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Provider%2A> property references a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control acting as the provider in the connection, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Consumer%2A> property references a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or server control acting as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Provider%2A>Odwołań do właściwości <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>lub inny formant serwer działający jako dostawca przez połączenie i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Consumer%2A>odwołań do właściwości <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>lub formantu serwera, który działa jako klient.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Consumer%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Provider%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ProviderConnectionPoint%2A> property references the connection's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A> property references the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ProviderConnectionPoint%2A>Właściwość odwołuje się do połączenia <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>obiektu, gdy <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A>odwołań do właściwości <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>obiektu.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ProviderConnectionPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs"></xref> class without requiring a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs"> </xref> klasy bez konieczności <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: This is the default constructor.
trans-unit.target: Jest to domyślny konstruktor.

trans-unit.source: It does not require a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: Nie wymaga <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>obiektu.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The constructor initializes the values of its properties by assigning each of its connection-related parameter objects to the corresponding property.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktor inicjuje wartości właściwości przez przypisanie każdego z jego obiektów parametry połączenia do odpowiedniej właściwości.

trans-unit.source: The control acting as the provider.
trans-unit.target: Formant działający jako dostawca.

trans-unit.source: The provider connection point.
trans-unit.target: Punkt połączenia dostawcy.

trans-unit.source: The control acting as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Formant, działając jako klient.

trans-unit.source: The consumer connection point.
trans-unit.target: Punkt połączenia klienta.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy przy użyciu określonego <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor is used when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object is available.
trans-unit.target: Ta wersja <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>Konstruktor jest używany podczas <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>obiekt jest dostępny.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server control acting as the provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> Lub kontrolki serwera działający jako dostawca.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"></xref> for the connection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"> </xref> Dla połączenia.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server control acting as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> Lub formantu serwera, który działa jako klient.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"></xref> for the connection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"> </xref> Dla połączenia.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> Obiektu.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> obiektu bieżącego połączenia.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object contains all the details of a Web Parts connection, including references to the provider control, the provider's connection point, the consumer control, and the consumer's connection point.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>Obiektu zawiera wszystkie szczegóły połączenia części sieci Web, w tym odniesienia do sterowania dostawcy, punkt połączenia dostawcy kontroli klienta i punkt połączenia klienta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać szczegółowe informacje dotyczące połączeń części sieci Web, zobacz <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, i [Omówienie połączeń części sieci Web](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Bieżący <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control that is acting as the consumer in the connection.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrolować, oznacza to, działając jako klient w połączeniu.

trans-unit.source: A connection between controls in a Web Parts zone requires one control to act as the provider and another to act as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Połączenie między formantami w strefie części sieci Web wymaga jeden formant do działania jako dostawcy i inny działać jako klient.

trans-unit.source: Each control must also have a connection point defined; in the consumer's case, the connection point must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: Każda kontrolka musi mieć również punktu połączenia zdefiniowane. w przypadku klienta, punkt połączenia musi być <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>obiektu.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać szczegółowe informacje dotyczące połączeń części sieci Web, zobacz <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, i [Omówienie połączeń części sieci Web](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> acting as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> Działając jako klient.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"></xref> object of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"> </xref> obiektu bieżącego połączenia.

trans-unit.source: A connection between controls in a Web Parts zone requires one control to act as the provider and another to act as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Połączenie między formantami w strefie części sieci Web wymaga jeden formant do działania jako dostawcy i inny działać jako klient.

trans-unit.source: Each control must also have a connection point defined; in the consumer's case, the connection point must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: Każda kontrolka musi mieć również punktu połączenia zdefiniowane. w przypadku klienta, punkt połączenia musi być <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>obiektu.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać szczegółowe informacje dotyczące połączeń części sieci Web, zobacz <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, i [Omówienie połączeń części sieci Web](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"></xref> of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"> </xref> Bieżącego połączenia.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control that is acting as the provider in the connection.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> czyli kontrolować działający jako dostawca w połączeniu.

trans-unit.source: A connection between controls in a Web Parts zone requires one control to act as the provider and another to act as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Połączenie między formantami w strefie części sieci Web wymaga jeden formant do działania jako dostawcy i inny działać jako klient.

trans-unit.source: Each control must also have a connection point defined; in the provider's case, the connection point must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: Każda kontrolka musi mieć również punktu połączenia zdefiniowane. w przypadku dostawcy punkt połączenia musi być <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>obiektu.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać szczegółowe informacje dotyczące połączeń części sieci Web, zobacz <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, i [Omówienie połączeń części sieci Web](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> acting as the provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> Działający jako dostawca.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"></xref> object of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"> </xref> obiektu bieżącego połączenia.

trans-unit.source: A connection between controls in a Web Parts zone requires one control to act as the provider and another to act as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Połączenie między formantami w strefie części sieci Web wymaga jeden formant do działania jako dostawcy i inny działać jako klient.

trans-unit.source: Each control must also have a connection point defined; in the provider's case, the connection point must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: Każda kontrolka musi mieć również punktu połączenia zdefiniowane. w przypadku dostawcy punkt połączenia musi być <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>obiektu.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać szczegółowe informacje dotyczące połączeń części sieci Web, zobacz <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, i [Omówienie połączeń części sieci Web](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"></xref> of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"> </xref> Bieżącego połączenia.
